messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

FYI

http://codereview.appspot.com/5605049/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go
File src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5605049/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go#newcode67
src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go:67: // Merge two raw query strings.
// addQuery merges two raw query strings.

It won't appear in godoc so it doesn't matter much..

also maybe name it joinQueries?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5605049/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go
File src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5605049/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go#newcode67
src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go:67: // Merge two raw query strings.
On 2012/02/01 21:55:11, nictuku wrote:
> // addQuery merges two raw query strings.
> 
> It won't appear in godoc so it doesn't matter much..
> 
> also maybe name it joinQueries?

Done.

Ping ? 

On 2012/02/02 02:18:14, robfig wrote:
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5605049/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go
> File src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go (right):
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5605049/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go#newcode67
> src/pkg/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy.go:67: // Merge two raw query strings.
> On 2012/02/01 21:55:11, nictuku wrote:
> > // addQuery merges two raw query strings.
> > 
> > It won't appear in godoc so it doesn't matter much..
> > 
> > also maybe name it joinQueries?
> 
> Done.

Sorry, this slipped through the cracks and was fixed independently.

In the future feel free to be more aggressive with ping emails... I won't
mind.

- Brad


On Sat, Feb 11, 2012 at 2:12 PM, <robfig@gmail.com> wrote:

> *** Abandoned ***
>

Cheers,
Rob
